title: How to Make Easy No Knead Bread Rolls

steps.headline: Line a baking tray/sheet with parchment/baking paper.
Mix all of the dry ingredients together.
Mix with a spoon to form a wet and sticky dough.
Spoon five dough balls onto the lined baking tray.
Cover loosely with greased plastic wrap.
steps.description: Leave to proof (rise) for 1 to 1 and 1/2 hours.

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to 220ºC (or 200ºC for a fan oven) about 10 minutes towards the end of the proofing.
Place the baking tray in the oven.
steps.description: Bake in the preheated oven for 15 to 18 minutes.

steps.headline: Serve!
steps.description: Eat immediately or transfer onto a wire rack straight away. These are best eaten warm and fresh. Enjoy.

text: Line a baking tray/sheet with parchment/baking paper.  Mix all of the dry ingredients together.  Add water. This will activate the yeast. Mix with a spoon to form a wet and sticky dough.  Spoon five dough balls onto the lined baking tray.  Cover loosely with greased plastic wrap. Leave to proof (rise) for 1 to 1 and 1/2 hours. Preheat the oven to 220ºC (or 200ºC for a fan oven) about 10 minutes towards the end of the proofing.  Place the baking tray in the oven. Bake in the preheated oven for 15 to 18 minutes. Serve! Eat immediately or transfer onto a wire rack straight away. These are best eaten warm and fresh. Enjoy.
